comment.author: Brook
comment.text: Don't worry, we won't let her go to jail and we won't let him be president! We are the women!

replies.author: Cody
replies.text: Then you are a disgrace to women.

replies.author: Brook
replies.text: Get the F off my page!

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Brook so your voting because she's a woman?

replies.author: Mikayla
replies.text: If you are " the women ". Why would you vote for ". IT "
